title: Excellent field emission with enhanced photodetection behavior of multiwalled carbon nanotubes: experimental and theoretical study
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00183D, Paper
Open Access

Utkarsh Kumar, Arpit Verma, Ravi Kant Tripathi, B. C. Yadav, Toton Haldar, V. V. Tyagi, C. K. Dixit, Wen-Min Huang
In this study, we synthesized multiwalled carbon nanotubes (MWCNTs) using the direct liquid injection chemical vapor deposition (DLICVD) method, the growth temperatures were varied to investigate their unique properties.
